{{cpp/experimental/title|minmax}}
{{cpp/experimental/simd/navbar}}

{{ddcl|header=experimental/simd|since=parallelism_ts_2|
template&lt; class T, class Abi &gt;
std::pair&lt;simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;, simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;&gt;
minmax( const simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;&amp; a, const simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;&amp; b ) noexcept;
}}

Returns both the element-wise min result and element-wise max result.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|a|the first vector of elements for {{tt|minmax}}}}
{{par|b|the second vector of elements for {{tt|minmax}}}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
An object {{tt|r}}, where the {{math|i}}{{sup|th}} element of {{c|r.first}} is {{c|std::min(a[i], b[i])}}, and the {{math|i}}{{sup|th}} element of {{c|r.second}} is {{c|std::max(a[i], b[i])}}.
